casebody.data:
No. 10-170. Brian Martin, et al., Petitioners v. Raquel Hanic, Personal Representative of the Estate of Rudy Escobedo, Deceased. 562 U.S. 962, 131 S. Ct. 463,

178 L. Ed. 2d 288,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7999. October 12, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 600 F.3d 770.
